description: '''Lofi hip-hop''', or '''chillhop,'''  is a style of [[lo-fi music]] that combines [[hip-hop]] beats with elements of [[chill-out music|chill-out]]. The word lofi (also typeset as '''lo-fi''', short for "low fidelity"), refers to the unpolished production techniques common in the style. It was popularized in the 2010s on [[YouTube]].
